mapper.select: SELECT content_id AS contentId, type AS type, cts_nm AS ctsNm, cts_path AS ctsPath , thumbnail_path AS thumbnailPath, playtime AS playtime FROM pixelviewer.playlist_contents WHERE content_id IN ${contentIdList}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Playlists ( playlist_nm, layer_id, preset_id, screen_id, content_id_list, update_date ) VALUES ( #{playlistNm}, #{layerId}, #{presetId}, #{screenId}, "NULL", NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT PL.playlist_id, PL.playlist_nm, P.preset_id, P.preset_nm, L.layer_id, L.layer_nm FROM Playlists AS PL LEFT JOIN Presets AS P ON P.preset_id = PL.preset_id LEFT JOIN Layers AS L ON L.preset_id = PL.preset_id WHERE playlist_id IN ${idList} GROUP BY PL.playlist_id

SELECT playlist_nm AS playlistNm, layer_id AS layerId, preset_id AS presetId, playlist_id AS playlistId, content_id_list AS contentIdList, screen_id AS screenId, update_date AS updateDate FROM Playlists WHERE Playlists.layer_id = #{layerId} AND Playlists.select_yn = 'Y'
